Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Starts the Loader for the given configuration files. You may use single files and/or directorys separated with spaces to specify configuration files or you may leave it blank to run all configuration files in the configuration directory.

Parameters:
args - A list of configurations files or directories containing such files. All configuration files in the configuration folder will be used if empty.

createLoader

private static void createLoader(java.io.File file)
Creates a new Loader for the given file.

Parameters:
file - A configuration file.

loadEach

private static void loadEach(java.util.List<java.io.File> configs)
Scans the given list of files for configuration files and creates a Loader for each of them

Parameters:
configs - The list of files which should be scanned for configuration files.
